text: "Runaway" is a 1995 debut song by Irish band The Corrs. It was released in September 1995. It had middling chart success except in Ireland and Australia. It was taken from their debut album Forgiven, Not Forgotten. ==Track listings== ==References== Category:1995 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Debut singles Category:Pop ballads Category:The Corrs songs
title: Runaway (The Corrs song)
